column5: Actually it'll be Thursday before I see the sun come up on Lake St. John. Today's the last day for packing and the last night in my current digs. Tomorrow is load and go to my new place on Lake St. John! I've already been working for a few hours today (got up at 4!) buttoning up what's left. Everything is changing this week, new home, radical changes in my tackle business (that happened just last night) so I guess that tomorrow really will be the first day of the rest of my life (ouch! I HATE old adages). Somehow I think the few hours sleep I got last night will have to do me for a while! Coffee break over -back to it!  Michael
Packing/Unpacking is never fun. But new digs on the water....good on you.  Git er dun and then relax.
